name: places/ChIJ95HBC05ZwokRZZPdgsn0r9Y
formattedAddress: 49 Mercer St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 49 Mercer St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text: I have loved this brand since I came across it a couple of years ago. I finally ordered a bag. It was the prettiest, softest, and coolest bag, and the price was not that bad. I ordered it thinking it would take 5 days to arrive since I did regular shipping, but it came within 2 days. The only thing I did not like was Fed Ex they just dropped off the box outside and did not even knock on the door.  That would have sucked if I was not home and  someone took the box. But that's not Toteme's fault, I guess.

originalText.text: Beautiful items and store layout, very helpful sales associates. I went in to try on a couple of bags and walked out with a dream bag I know I’ll have for a long time. Will certainly be returning because it’s great to have the chance to view items in person.

text.text: Beautiful items and store layout, very helpful sales associates. I went in to try on a couple of bags and walked out with a dream bag I know I’ll have for a long time. Will certainly be returning because it’s great to have the chance to view items in person.

originalText.text:
The customer service at this location is absolutely horrible! First, they made people wait outside in a freezing weather, creating a line outside of a store, had to wait in line for 30 minutes to make a simple return. Then sales associates completely ignored my presence and the whole vibe was just weird. Finally, when I was able to get a hold of one, I told her that I bought an item online and want to return it at the store, had both papers with receipt saying that mailing back or dropping off an item at an offline location is an option! She took my receipts and my item to “inspect” and then came back 2 minutes later handing it back to me and in a very condescending manner saying that she can’t accept it since it was a sale item so it couldn’t be returned neither online nor at the store. I just said okay and left disappointed. But then, I read my receipts again where it clearly said that I can return my purchase and steps to follow to ship it back. Which I’m glad I did try, despite her telling me that it couldn’t be returned and shipped back. The website asked for a photo of an item and then gave me an option for a refund.
I’m extremely annoyed that I went to soho for nothing, waited 30 min in a freezing cold in line, to just have been told “no, you can’t return it, the item is unrefundable”  to only find out later that apparently it is refundable (otherwise there wouldn’t even be these receipts with steps to follow to ship it back) and having to travel to fedex office to drop it off!
Wasted time, only because an unprofessional, unhelpful employee.

originalText.text: I highly recommend making this store a self-service spot. With the great location and garments, the lack of energy and weird vibe of the staff seem to be a waste. Staff are busy trying on garments on themselves instead of offering service to the customers, which is a very funny scene. I will keep on shopping with TOTEME online and save my time for this store.

Staff are busy trying on garments on themselves instead of offering service to the customers, which is a very funny scene. I will keep on shopping with TOTEME online and save my time for this store.

originalText.text: Really disappointing experience with the staff in the Soho location. As I see on these reviews, I’m not the only one. I went in to this store for the first time as I shop frequently online. I was helped by a girl with who was just extremely condescending and rude. I caught her rolling her eyes at me when she walked away to get me something I wanted to try on. I felt so uncomfortable I left without purchasing anything. Won’t be returning unless they change the staff, can’t believe they tolerate that behavior.
